LanguageData.TemperateForest.label: 温带森林
LanguageData.TemperateForest.description: 散布着肥沃的土壤落叶乔木林。丛林里和平原上游荡着多种多样的动物群落。冬季的积雪会导致出行变得缓慢。
LanguageData.TemperateSwamp.label: temperate swamp
LanguageData.TemperateSwamp.description: Extremely dense vegetation and marshy terrain make it very difficult to move around here and build big structures. Many species of animals live in this area.
